categories: Category:Rogue One: A Star Wars Story actors

nodes.text: Guy Henry (born October 17, 1960) is an English stage and screen actor who portrays Governor Tarkin in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. Whilst filming, he cited original Tarkin actor Peter Cushing as an inspiration for his portrayal, which Rogue One director Gareth Edwards recognized when he cast Henry to double as the actor.
Henry portrayed Sherlock Holmes in the 1982 TV series Young Sherlock: The Mystery of the Manor House.
Other prominent roles include Cassius in HBO's miniseries Rome (with Lindsay Duncan), and puppet Minister of Magic Pius Thicknesse in Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows.
